author: rickywolfy101

text: I spent many nights with my brother playing this game. We loved that this game was split screen multi player. And we would always work as a team to beat the computer. It brought us together and I always get nostalgic hearing the memorable soundtrack. It brings me back.
author: Robert Maxwell

text: Track 1 is by far one of my most favorite songs from old school gaming. I also like track 3, but I do like the others like this one.

text: If you like Barry Leitch's music, I suggest checking out the Gadget Twins soundtrack. The game's decent but the music is pretty awesome.
author: Clyde the Hobo

text: I loved this game, easily one of my favorite racers on the SNES. Fast paced, vibrant graphics and Barry Leitch's music was rockin', with this theme being the mellowest one. Top Gear Rally on the N64 is the game I played most in this franchise, but this comes close.

text: Great underrated game with an amazing score! I remember me playing it with my brother.

author: CMSonYT

text: Barry Leitch actually released a new album a few months ago that is heavily inspired by Top Gear for a game called Horizon Chase. In fact, I think it has a couple of tracks that are modern remakes of the themes from Top Gear. Highly recommended if you're into his work :).
author: Mark Goninon
